duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, repair, maintain, troubleshoot, and debug dies in tool room & punch press locations.
Repair & maintain piping system, compressed air, boiler, fume incineration, vacuum, air conditioning, and energy management systems.

Repair & maintain mechanical equipment according to manuals and manufacturer specifications, such as lubrication & conveyor systems, machine & metal fabricating tools, & production equipment by using hand tools, power tools, and precision-measuring and testing instruments.
Attend safety meetings & process improvement discussions.
Operate hand & power tools in a maintenance environment. Knowledge of stamping dies, construction techniques, & troubleshooting.
Work independently or as a team with minimal supervision. Read and understand instructions at a HS level competency. Perform mathematical calculations required for repairing equipment.
